❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ what better way to enjoy the holidays than with pretty home decor that doubles as a mug rug holiday crochet mug rug also walks you through the different types of colorwork with video instruction see the differences between intarsia tapestry or fair isle crochet colorwork i hope you enjoy the festive holiday home decor as much as i do **crochet hook ** 4 0 mm 6 furls hook 1 **notions ** yarn needle scissors **yarn ** brava worsted yarn 2 - white - wine - dublin **yardage ** approx 30 yards **abbreviations/stitches ** chain- chain rs- right side single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch sts- stitches ws- wrong side **gauge** 18 single_crochet sts and 16 row = 4 with g-hook **measurements/sizes ** 6 inches 15 cm wide 5 inches 13 cm tall without fringe sizes can vary depending on the colorwork method used **skill level ** intermediate the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by
